document_data.name: Screaming Wind
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite adventurers league/A City on the Edge|24}}
document_data.text: You must be visitors. You here to help or to sightsee?
document_data.Description: Screaming Wind had yellow fur with black spots. Her eyes were green. Although she was young, she was wise and an accomplished hunter.
document_data.Personality:
Screaming Wind only spoke when she had something of importance to say, and those who knew her also knew to listen when she spoke. She preferred to stay out of large groups.{{Cite adventurers league/Peril at the Port|26}}

If attacked without someone to protect, she preferred to flee.{{Cite adventurers league/A Walk in the Park|5}}
